message.name: ERR_TASK_XRV_NO_UNRESERVED_TASK
message.locale: A task was not added to your My Tasks list as there are currently no assigned tasks that match the selected criteria.

message.name: INF_USER_XRV_UNSUSCRIBED_TO_ALL_WORK_QUEUES
message.locale: You are not currently subscribed to any work queues.

message.name: ERR_USER_XRV_UNSUSCRIBED_TO_WORK_QUEUE
message.locale: A task cannot be added to the My Tasks list from the selected work queue as you are not currently subscribed to that work queue.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_XRV_NO_UNRESERVED_TASK
message.locale: There are currently no tasks assigned to the selected work queue. Please select a different work queue.

message.name: ERR_TASK_XRV_DUPLICATE_RECORD
message.locale: Duplicate Task Record.

message.name: ERR_TASK_XFV_SPECIFY_SEARCH_CRITERIA
message.locale: You may search using either the Case Reference Number or the Participant if a Task Id has not been entered.

message.name: INF_TASK_XFV_MATCHED_RESULTS_FOUND
message.locale: %1s tasks found that match the search criteria.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_USER_ALREADY_SUBSCRIBED
message.locale: This user is already subscribed to this work queue.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_XRV_USER_IS_CLOSED
message.locale: A closed user cannot subscribe to the work queue.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_ORGUNIT_ALREADY_SUBSCRIBED
message.locale: This Organization Unit is already subscribed to this work queue.
This Organisation unit is already subscribed to this work queue.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_POSITION_ALREADY_SUBSCRIBED
message.locale: This Position is already subscribed to this work queue.

message.name: ERR_WORK_QUEUE_JOB_ALREADY_SUBSCRIBED
message.locale: This Job is already subscribed to this work queue.

message.name: INF_CONST_ALL
message.locale: All

message.name: ERR_TASK_SEARCH_NO_CRITERIA
message.locale: Select at least one search criteria.

message.name: ERR_TASK_BUSINESS_OBJECT_TYPE_NOT_SELECTED
message.locale: Please select a Business Object Type search criteria.

message.name: ERR_TASK_ASSIGNED_TO_NOT_SELECTED
message.locale: Please select an Assigned To search criteria.

message.name: ERR_TASK_SEARCH_BY_TASKID_ONLY
message.locale: When searching by the task identifier, you may not enter any other search criteria.

message.name: ERR_TASK_SEARCH_MINIMUM_CRITERIA
message.locale: One of "Assigned To" or "Business Object Type" or "Task ID" must be selected.

message.name: ERR_TASK_XRV_NO_PREFERRED_WORK_QUEUE
message.locale: A task cannot be added to your My Tasks list as the preferred work queue inbox user preference has not been set.

message.name: ERR_TASK_XRV_NO_PREFERRED_ORG_UNIT
message.locale: A task cannot be added to your My Tasks list as the preferred organization unit inbox user preference has not been set.
A task cannot be added to your My Tasks list as the preferred organisation unit inbox user preference has not been set.

message.name: ERR_PREFERRED_ORG_UNIT_XRV_NO_AVAILABLE_TASKS
message.locale: There are currently no tasks assigned to the preferred organization unit. Please select a different preferred organization unit.
There are currently no tasks assigned to the preferred organisation unit. Please select a different preferred organisation unit.

message.name: ERR_TASK_ORDER_BY_CLASS_NOT_SUPPORTED
message.locale: Sorting by "%1s" is not supported.

message.name: INF_OVERDUE_TASKS_FOUND
message.locale: You have %1d overdue task(s).

message.name: INF_READMULTI_MAX_EXCEEDED
message.locale: Displaying %1d of %2d.

message.name: INF_OVERDUE_ICON_ALT_TEXT
message.locale: Overdue
